scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'esbuild,less' -c 'yellow,blue' " esbuild src/index.tsx --outdir=build --bundle --watch " " less-watch-compiler styles build index.less "
scripts.build: lessc styles/index.less build/index.css && esbuild index=src/index.tsx build/index.css --outdir=build --allow-overwrite --bundle --minify
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run server && npm run start
scripts.serv: npm run server && npm run start
